data.title: Our Alumni Contribute to Emmy-Nominated Productions
data.meta_description: More than 25 alumni from different degree programs contributed their talents to Emmy-nominated productions including The Mandalorian, WandaVision and Pen15. Find out more.
data.text:
Congratulations to the alumni who worked on more than 23 different productions for the 73rd Annual Emmys

We are proud to recognize the talented alumni who worked on Emmy-nominated productions for the 73rd Annual Primetime Emmys. More than 25 alumni from different degree programs contributed their talents to productions including The Mandalorian, WandaVision and Pen15. Alum Josh Gitersonke (Film 2007) was personally nominated for Outstanding Cinematography for a Reality Program for his work as Director of Photography on The Amazing Race. This is Josh Gitersonke’s eighth Emmy nomination. He previously won an Emmy for his camera work on the Carpool Karaoke Primetime Special.

According to the Television Academy, there are roughly 24,000 voting members who decide on the nominations and who ultimately select the winners of the prized Emmy statue in September. The 73rd Annual Emmys will air on Sunday, September 19, 2021. We are excited to cheer on our alumni and recognize their creative talents in the industry!

73rd Annual Emmy Award Nominations

Here is the list of L.A. Film School Alumni who worked on Emmy-nominated productions
